data.title: How being married to cricket royalty inspired Jemima Khan’s new film
data.meta_description: The film producer penned the story for her newest release, which her ex (Pakistani cricket icon Imran Khan) is, surprisingly, a big fan of.
data.text:
Glynis Traill-Nash

Jan 27, 2023 – 12.01pm

EmailLinkedInTwitterFacebook

Subscribe to gift this article

Gift 5 articles to anyone you choose each month when you subscribe.

Subscribe now

Already a subscriber?

Jemima Khan is relaxed and fresh-faced, sipping hot water and lemon, with no suggestion of having just arrived in Sydney from London. This is her first visit to Australia, accompanied by her best Aussie pal and a restaurant list from another friend, Nigella Lawson: “She said the food in Sydney is insanely good.”

Khan is in town to promote her new romantic comedy What’s Love Got to Do With It?, and discussion quickly turns to matters of the heart. She believes there is a lot to learn from the idea of “walking into love” rather than falling into it heart first.
